translation.Message_0_Page_0: Wow! Is this real!? An actual survivor! I haven't seen one in quite some time!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: I'm <name_npc>. And I'm a resident of Brussels. <pause> Well when Brussels was still intact.
translation.Response_0: I can't believe it either! You're not a zombie, you're a person!
translation.Response_2: I'm just going to be on my way.
